snippet: Weighing in for the first time on the Supreme Court arguments on the constitutionality of his 2010 health care law, President Obama said he was confident that the act would be upheld by the court.
abstract: Weighing in for the first time on the Supreme Court arguments on the constitutionality of his 2010 health care law, President Obama said he was confident that the act would be upheld by the court.

headline.main: Obama Remains Confident That Court Will Uphold Health Care Law
